column4: Can anyone help me ? If I am using git, and i have two branch, one is a, one is b, then, i want to replace c.txt in branch b with c.txt in branch a, Is there a simple solution ? thx
Also, I have a problem that, I want to bind a shortcut key for open a new terminal, or a new tab in the openned terminal, is there any suggestions ?
Hi
I want one short key, that do open a tab if a terminal is openned, or a new terminal
alt + ctl + t on most ditros
i know it, but it always open a new terminal
but i want to open a new tab if there is a terminal is oppened...
oh, I see
ctrl + alt + t always open a new terminal....:(
ctl + t opens a tab
ctrl + shift + t can open a tab, but you must switch to the terminal first, but if i am not working in the terminal?
ctl + shft + t opens a tab sorry
i know, but if we are not working in the terminal, how to do it?
why would you want to open a tab that ur not going to use

I am not meaning that, think this, you firt open a terminal, do something, and then you min the terminal , and do other things, after a minute, you wan to open a new terminal, i don't want to switch to the openned terminal then ctrl + shift + t, I hope there is an shortcut to switch to the openned terminal and open a new tab
just like ff woks
i think i see  some kind of focus on open tab and auto open tab thing !
er, how ?
on my system i alt tab back to the terminal i opened brings up the blinking cursor the i could ctl + shift + t with out touching mouse
if you open many windows, then alt+tab will be tired

it goes back to the last one used
it goes back to the last one used
